intro: Cymbalaria pallida f. handelii, commonly known as the pale weed or pale-flowered storm petal, is a flowering plant in the family Scrophulariaceae. It is a low-growing annual herb characterized by its slender stems and opposite, lance-shaped leaves. The flowers are typically pale pink to white, with five lobes, and are borne in clusters at the leaf axils. This plant is native to southern Europe and has been introduced to other regions, often growing in disturbed soils and along roadsides. It is known for its rapid growth and ability to thrive in a variety of environmental conditions.
